page.title: 09RECREATION LEISURE TIME
page.content: We conducted a survey of children's leisure time activities. Fifteen children are members of outside organisations. Twelve belong to the youth clubs held in West Grimstead and Alderbury.Four girl guides are members of the Alderbury girl guides and one goes to Salisbury. There are two scouts and two cubs, all members of the Lockerley pack. All children spent some of their time watching television. The most popular programes are Dallas, Cover up, and Knight Rider. Other indoor activivties range from reading and drawing to computer and board games. The main out door games are football, cricket and less organised ones like chase.
